system.description:
Also at 3rd level, when you prepare your artificer spells you can prepare certain spells and create spell inventions for them (or forgo them for modifications to your custom vehicle) in addition to your normal number of prepared spells. These spells count as artificer spells for you, even if they arenâ€™t on the artificer spell list.

TABLE: ENGINEER SPELLS

Artificer Level - Spell
3rd - expeditious retreat, grease
5th - heat metal, levitate
9th - fly, haste
13th - freedom of movement, stone shape
17th - animate objects, creation
